Source.Name: qrencode
Source.Summary: Libqrencode is a C library for encoding data in a QR Code symbol
Source.Description: Libqrencode is a fast and compact library for encoding data in a QR Code symbol, a 2D symbology that can be scanned by handy terminals such as a mobile phone with CCD. The capacity of QR Code is up to 7000 digits or 4000 characters and has high robustness.
